pages.title: Ribbed Newt
pages.text: The Iberian ribbed newt, gallipato or Spanish ribbed newt ($(o)Pleurodeles waltl$()) is a newt endemic to the central and southern Iberian Peninsula and Morocco.$(br2)This species should not be confused with the different species with similar common name, the Iberian newt ($(o)Lissotriton boscai).

pages.title: Ribbed Newt
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: None$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 3 Days
